Name: Master Alchemist
Description: All trophies obtained.

Description: Complete Chapter 1.

Name: Finals and the New Kid
Description: Complete Chapter 2.

Name: Summer Break and Ghost Stories
Description: Complete Chapter 3.

Name: Flay, Roxis, and a Battle Arena
Description: Complete Chapter 4.

Name: New Friends and a Father
Description: Complete Chapter 5.

Name: Research and UFO Encounters
Description: Complete Chapter 6.

Name: School Festival and a Trivia Contest?
Description: Complete Chapter 7.

Name: A Sick Cat and Mana Medicine
Description: Complete Chapter 8.

Name: Your Future and the History of Alchemy
Description: Complete Chapter 9.

Name: A Dying Cat, Helpless Me, and…
Description: Complete Chapter 10.

Name: Isolde’s Decision and Students’ Confusion
Description: Complete Chapter 11.

Name: Past Memories and Desired Future
Description: Complete Chapter 12.

Name: Friends, huh?
Description: Complete every nonfinale character quest episode in a single playthrough.

Name: With this space, I wish to…
Description: Enact your final wish.

Name: Was it… a joke?
Description: Learn about Philo’s mysterious illness.

Name: It won’t mean anything if you just fix it now!
Description: Let Philo convince you not to disappear.

Name: Hey!
Description: Learn how Nikki attracts all the guys.
Detail: Listen to Nikki’s song in the Workshop Hallway after completing Nikki II.

Name: It won’t mean anything if you just fix it now!
Description: Let Nikki convince you not to disappear.

Name: A single tear, rolling down your cheek…
Description: Protect Pamela from “Super Anna”.

Name: ...Fake crying again?
Description: Let Pamela convince you not to disappear.

Name: So, you figured out who I am…
Description: Learn the identity of the Defender of Justice.

Name: Every great hero holds some darkness within.
Description: Let Flay convince you not to disappear.

Name: This is… a Mana’s…
Description: Help Roxis form a contract with the Mana of Light.

Name: Which one of us is more horrible?
Description: Let Roxis convince you not to disappear.

Name: I will repay it!
Description: Prove your utility to Anna by escaping the ruins.

Name: I want to clear your thoughts this time.
Description: Let Anna convince you not to disappear.

Name: ...without this alchemy…
Description: See Muppy’s expulsion overturned and the hostage situation resolved.

Name: It’s so warm…
Description: Let Muppy convince you not to disappear.

Name: A Lightbulb Moment
Description: Perform a recipe derivation for the first time.

Name: Top Tier
Description: Synthesize an item with an Ether Level of 100.

Name: We should power up before we go!
Description: Equip each character with his or her ultimate weapon and armor.
Detail: Recipes for the ultimate armor are found in <Resource Center: Unorganized Zone>; those for the ultimate weapons are found in <Heart’s Prison>. All 16 pieces of equipment must be equipped simultaneously.

Name: Synthesizer
Description: Synthesize every item in a single playthrough.

Name: Decisive
Description: Perform a Finishing Burst in order to win a fight.

Name: Veterans
Description: Across all playthroughs, win 500 battles.

Name: Perfect Teamwork
Description: Across all playthroughs, perform 100 Variable Strikes.

Name: Weakness Master
Description: Across all playthroughs, reach Burst Mode 100 times.

Name: Know Thy Enemy
Description: Reach 100% Bestiary completion.

Name: Five Figures
Description: Deal 10,000 damage with a single attack.

Name: *pant* *pant* You’re all so fast…
Description: Win the Marathon Event.

Name: Bring lotsa money. Okay?
Description: Hold 100,000 Cole at once.

Name: Side Gig
Description: Complete your first Job.

Name: Student… or Staff?
Description: Complete all 62 Jobs in one playthrough.

Name: Valedictorian
Description: Earn an [A] in every class taken in one playthrough.

Name: Innate Strength
Description: Reach 100% Grow Book completion with a character.

Name: Final Form
Description: Reach 100% Grow Book completion with all characters.

Name: Grain of Truth
Description: Across all playthroughs, unlock every rumor in the Gossip Shop.
Enter the Bonus Dungeon.

Name: The True Final Boss
Description: Defeat Darkash.

Name: Undefeated
Description: Complete the game without losing a single fight.

Name: I didn’t even get a chance to warm up.
Description: Complete the game without ever allowing a party member to become incapacitated.

Name: Grow… Buck?
Description: Complete the game with all characters still at 0% Grow Book completion.

Name: Antithetical
Description: Complete the game without using any Usable items.
Detail: Usable items cannot be used in battle, nor in the field. Key items, such as [Wings of Icarus] and the gathering items (e.g., [Shovel]), as well as those which Nikki uses for «Summon Friend» can be used. Philo may also use Material items for «On-the-Spot Synthesis». Usable items may still be used in synthesis without any restrictions.

Name: Aww, how cute!
Description: Complete the game while entering only 22 battles and defeating only 46 enemies.
Detail: Enter only the 22 required battles throughout the game and defeat only those enemies which are required. (Some characters in required fights may summon additional enemies—these summons must be prevented.) (More information)
